workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.17685059143543347 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.046109512915978756 --weight-decay 0.00066156425027778 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0007714377357117932 --lr-period-updates 85341.25942524901 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.025430450383530513 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
